column4: why the 3D is not integrated in the xubuntu ? like in ubuntu?
most people that install xubuntu don't like all the hand holding that ubuntu does, so it expects you to do much manually
yeap, so you confirm me that the 3d is not installed by default on xubuntu?
it's in ubuntu-restricted-modules-$(uname -r) . I'm not sure if it gets installed by default
